static member MakeCustomAnimation : Android.Content.Context * int * int -> Android.App.ActivityOptions

Docs.param: Who is defining this. This is the application that the animation resources will be loaded from.
A resource ID of the animation resource to use for the incoming activity. Use 0 for no animation.
A resource ID of the animation resource to use for the outgoing activity. Use 0 for no animation.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying a custom animation to run when the activity is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Android.App.ActivityOptions MakeScaleUpAnimation (Android.Views.View source, int startX, int startY, int width, int height);
.method public static hidebysig class Android.App.ActivityOptions MakeScaleUpAnimation(class Android.Views.View source, int32 startX, int32 startY, int32 width, int32 height) cil managed
static member MakeScaleUpAnimation : Android.Views.View * int * int * int * int -> Android.App.ActivityOptions

Docs.param: The View that the new activity is animating from. This defines the coordinate space for startX and startY.
The x starting location of the new activity, relative to source.
The y starting location of the activity, relative to source.
The initial width of the new activity.
The initial height of the new activity.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where the new activity is scaled from a small originating area of the screen to its final full representation.

Docs.param: The View that this thumbnail is animating from. This defines the coordinate space for startX and startY.
The bitmap that will be shown as the initial thumbnail of the animation.
The x starting location of the bitmap, relative to source.
The y starting location of the bitmap, relative to source.
Docs.summary: Create an ActivityOptions specifying an animation where a thumbnail is scaled from a given position to the new activity window that is being started.
